评论详情: The fish smell on the material would not go away even after a couple months outside on deck.  Waste of money sadly.  But beautiful.
Really good value for the money! Used for a denim and diamond event!!
Super cute and love the price. My friends bought a glitter belt at a local western shop for $70 and that’s not something I wanted to do. BUT it came and the buckle is rusted.

Cute belt, true to size, only lasted 3 wears and the silver trimming (beads) started to come apart.  Same with the silver belt.  If you need something to wear for one or two nights without breaking the bank then this is a purchase for you.
Glitter falls off but otherwise its fine!

Bought this belt for a cowgirl Barbie look, it is so beautiful!! it’s so sparkly, and definitely goes with every color because of a holographic glitter/rhinestones!! I got so many compliments!!! I just want to wear it all the time lol
Love the sparkle! Add this to your jeans and you ready for night out! I get so many compliments on this belt.
Fidèle à la photo. Cette ceinture correspond exactement à mon attente
Der Gürtel ist Wunderschön, leicht, toll verarbeitet - ich kaufe mir noch eine in einer anderen Farbe 👍🥰
Der Gürtel sieht sehr gut aus und passt genau. Leider riecht er etwas streng und ich hoffe, das legt sich noch!
